Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there My ads have been rejected with the following message
"Violation of Advertising Policy - The product associated with your ad violates our Advertising Policy -- . Please select another product to advertise and resubmit."
I'm sorry to hear that your ads have been rejected. Could you please share the specific message or reason provided for the rejection? This will help me guide you on the next steps.
how do I tell which policy I have violated?

It looks like your ad was rejected due to a violation of our Advertising Policy. I recommend reviewing the specific guidelines in our Ad Policy document to understand what might have caused the issue. You can find the detailed policy here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). Once you've identified the issue, you can make the necessary changes and resubmit your ad. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

To determine which specific policy your ad violated, you should carefully review the rejection email you received. It usually contains a detailed explanation of the violation. Additionally, you can refer to our Ad Policy document for a comprehensive understanding of all guidelines and restrictions. Here's the link to the policy: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you're still unsure, feel free to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for further clarification.
Got it! Please go ahead and share the details from the email, and I'll do my best to help you understand the violation and how to address it.

Hello,

Your ad ((copy) Good Better Bakers) is not running! Immediate action is required to comply with our ad policy.


Reject reason: Violation of Advertising Policy - The product associated with your ad violates our Advertising Policy. Please select another product to advertise and resubmit.


Your partnership and cooperation in maintaining a high standard of advertising quality are highly appreciated. If you have any questions or need further assistance, just reply to this email. We’re here to help.


We eagerly anticipate receiving your revised ad for prompt reevaluation!


Related ad in
Please share the content of the email, and I'll help you figure out the next steps to resolve the issue with your ad.

Thanks for sharing the details. It seems like the product you're advertising doesn't align with our Advertising Policy. To resolve this, you should review the specific guidelines in our Ad Policy document to identify what might be causing the issue. You can find it here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). Once you've identified and corrected the issue, you can resubmit your ad for reevaluation. If you need further assistance or clarification, feel free to reply to the email or contact adsupport@newsbreak.com.
You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!
